metadata.title: CVE-2020-19188 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in fmt_entry function inprogs/dump_entry.c:1116 in ncurses 6.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via crafted command.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
